title: In the swim: poolside accessories
text:
Tropez daybed by Hommes, £11,520

Upholstered in weatherproof synthetic leather on an ash wood frame. luxdeco.com

Bon Vivant pouf by Janice Feldman for JANUS et Cie, from $1,363

With three sizes available, the poufs can be displayed individually or work well together to create a larger lounging area. janusetcie.com

Folding fan by Cai & Jo, £10

Keep a breeze on your face with this satin and bamboo creation. A must-have for your poolside tote. caiandjo.com

Suzani parasol by FARO, £390

Stay out of the heat under this blue and green embroidered piece. farohome.com

Jumbo Stripe reversible towel cushion by Matilda Goad & Co, £65

Easily washable and equally suited to the pool, garden or bathroom armchair. matildagoad.com

Acrylic jug by Club Matters, £30

A practical design that brings a pop of colour to the poolside. BPA-free and available in three colourways. clubmatters.com

Pool throw by Siri Miri, £210

Made to order in Italy from organic cotton terry. It is customisable with different border and colour options. sirimiri.co.uk

Ladies Pond stools by Sella Concept, £2,500+VAT

Part of a collection that references the hues of Hampstead's Ladies' Pond. Made from jesmonite and designed for indoor and outdoor use.
sella-concept.com

La Piscine linen tablecloth by Summerill and Bishop, from £295

A design that brings the vision of the pool to you. Matching napkins available. summerillandbishop.com

Always Greener rug by Andrew Martin, from £570

A recycled PET rug designed by Kit Kemp and Annie Selke that's suitable for indoor or outdoor use. andrewmartin.co.uk

Ray table lamp by Daniel Schofield for Menu, €210

A portable lamp that uses LED bulbs and is chargeable via USB. menuspace.com

Beoplay EX earphones by Bang & Olufsen, £349

These earphones are waterproof for up to 30 minutes in a metre of water.
bang-olufsen.com
